response.overview: In a near future great Britian, of about 2029, the world is overrun by an alien called 'The Jupiter 523' invades earth, and turns everyone into other Jupiter 523s, but only about 50% the world can be infected, so the original 532 (nicknamed 'The Infector') turns the closed person to someone who is immortal into one of them, and hunts them down, forcing them to hide in their homes. And don't leave their victim has killed themself. But all of that is at threat when they finally hunt down a highly religious man named 'David Clark'

response.title: The Jupiter 523
